name: Plunge (itch) (RossHayao, kalynn, cbgreely)
description:
Made for the 2021 Fitchburg State University Fall Game Jam.  

Theme: Adaptation

Last as long as you can against unending enemies, with only your reflexes, speed, and adaptable weapons platform.

Credits:

Level Design, Weapon Sprites/Sprite Animations/Weapon Sprite Sheets, Sounds, Game Logo, HUD Sprite - Chris Greely.

3D Modeling, Model Textures, Enemy Sprites/Sprite Animations/Sprite Sheets - Kalynn Vazquez.

Programming (C#) - Ross Hayao.
